events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to request a refund or exchange for a different size as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for money back or exchange because of sizing issues.
Assigning the case to the refunds department to handle the customer’s request regarding their jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange for the jacket you received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the size you would like to exchange for or if you prefer a full refund?
Sure, my order number is 78912345, and I would like to exchange the jacket for a size medium instead of the large I received.
Thank you for the information. We can process an exchange for size medium and arrange a prepaid return label for the large jacket at no extra cost.
That sounds perfect, thanks for the quick help! I’ll wait for the return label and the medium size to be shipped.
The exchange request is now processed. You will receive the return label shortly via email, and the medium jacket will be shipped as soon as we get the returned item.
Just checking in to make sure you received the replacement medium jacket and that everything is satisfactory with your exchange.
Since the exchange was completed successfully and you confirmed receipt, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
